text: @MayorOfLA @CAgovernor Ever think it is the protests and riots? Or nah? Unstick your head from the sand. Realize it is not the bars, or the restaurants. It is the irresponsible people who are doing this, add in the masks... not working https://t.co/N9sPxRCKrz unless you HAVE Covid.
